fd:scripts.fd:click: [{"script":{"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.mainPanel.dashboard.newDisputeMeeting"\,"event":"Click"\,"model":{"nodeName":"EVENT_SCRIPTS"}\,"content":"//newDisputeMeetingrequest.visible = true;\\n//mainPanel.visible = false;\\n//fetch dispute details from ea and district\\n/* When user clicks on request a new dispute meeting button\, hide the dispute table and show the request a new dispute meeting screen */\\nSucNewDisputeMeetMessage.visible=false;\\nErrNewDisputeMeetMessage.visible=false;\\nMeetingType.value=null;\\nbutton_18784858221655692656075.enabled=true;\\nbutton_18784858221655692656075.value = \\"\\";\\nvar params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);\\nvar actualData=JSON.parse(window.atob(params.get('input')));\\n//console.log(actualData);\\n//console.log(\\"hh\\")\\nvar jsonData = {\\n \\"contractKey\\" : actualData.contract_number\,\\n \\"ea\\" : actualData.ea\,\\n \\"district\\" : actualData.district\\n}; \\n//console.log(jsonData);\\nvar dollarUSLocale12 = Intl.NumberFormat('en-US');\\n$.ajax({ \\n type: 'GET'\, \\n data: jsonData\,\\n url: window.location.protocol+\\"//\\"+window.location.hostname+\\":\\"+window.location.port+'/rest/services/Caltrans-eADR/Processes/GetTotalPCPDetails'\,\\n success: function (data) { \\n \\t var data1=JSON.parse(data.getElementsByTagName(\\"DRBMembersDetailsJson\\")[0].innerHTML);\\n \\t var data2=JSON.parse(data.getElementsByTagName(\\"LinkedDetailsJson\\")[0].innerHTML);\\n\\t\\t var count1\,checkCount=0;\\n \\t //console.log(typeof(data2));\\n \\t if(Object.values(data1.PCP_Details).length > 0){\\n if(typeof(data1.PCP_Details.Record.PCP_MAIN_PK)===\\"undefined\\"){\\n count1=data1.PCP_Details.Record.length;\\n }\\n else{\\n count1=1;\\n }\\n }\\n \\t else{\\n count1=0;\\n }\\n if(Object.values(data2.Existing_Details).length > 0){\\n if(typeof(data2.Existing_Details.ExisRecord.PCP_MAIN_PK)===\\"undefined\\"){\\n count2=data2.Existing_Details.ExisRecord.length;\\n }\\n else{\\n count2=1;\\n }\\n }\\n \\t else{\\n count2=0;\\n }\\n \\t if(count1===1){\\n tablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.addInstance(1); \\n tablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[0].PCRNoNew.value=data1.PCP_Details.Record.PCP_MAIN_PK;\\n if(data1.PCP_Details.Record.D_IPC_DESCR!==\\"null\\"){\\n tablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[0].DescNew.value=data1.PCP_Details.Record.D_IPC_DESCR;\\n }\\n if(data1.PCP_Details.Record.E_EST_COST!==\\"null\\"){\\n tablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[0].DollarNew.value=\\"$ \\"+dollarUSLocale12.format(data1.PCP_Details.Record.E_EST_COST);\\n }\\n if(data1.PCP_Details.Record.E_TIME_IMPACT!==\\"null\\"){\\n tablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[0].DelayDaysNew.value=data1.PCP_Details.Record.E_TIME_IMPACT;\\n }\\n if(data1.PCP_Details.Record.E_REC_DATE!==\\"null\\"){\\n tablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[0].DateSuppNew.value=data1.PCP_Details.Record.E_REC_DATE;\\n }\\n if(data1.PCP_Details.Record.E_COMMENT_DATE!==\\"null\\"){\\n \\ttablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[0].DateResNew.value=data1.PCP_Details.Record.E_COMMENT_DATE;\\n } \\n tablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[0].visible=true;\\n if(count2===1){\\n \\tif(data2.Existing_Details.ExisRecord.PCP_MAIN_PK === data1.PCP_Details.Record.PCP_MAIN_PK && tablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[0].newDisputetableItem11.enabled === true){\\n \\ttablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[0].newDisputetableItem11.enabled=false;\\n \\ttablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[0].newDisputetableItem11.value = \\"Y\\";\\n \\ttablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[0].DateReferNew.value=data2.Existing_Details.ExisRecord.CREATED_DATE;\\n \\t//checkCount = checkCount + 1;\\n \\t}\\n if(count1 == count2){ \\n button_18784858221655692656075.visible = false;\\n MeetingType.visible = false;\\n alert(\\"All PCRs are linked to existing disputes\\");\\n }\\n else{\\n button_18784858221655692656075.visible = true;\\n MeetingType.visible = true;\\n }\\n }\\n \\n /*else if(count2>1){\\n for(var j=0; j<data2.Existing_Details.ExisRecord.length; j++){\\n // && tablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[i].PCRNoNew.enabled === true\\n if(data2.Existing_Details.ExisRecord[j].PCP_MAIN_PK === data1.PCP_Details.Record.PCP_MAIN_PK && tablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[0].newDisputetableItem11.enabled === true){\\n tablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[0].newDisputetableItem11.enabled=false;\\n }\\n }\\n }*/\\n newDisputeMeetingrequest.visible = true;\\n mainPanel.visible = false;\\n }\\n else if(count1 === 0){\\n alert(\\"No PCRs linked to the contract number\\");\\n }\\n \\t else{\\n \\tfor(var i=0; i<data1.PCP_Details.Record.length; i++){\\n tablenewDispute.tablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.addInstance(1);\\n //alert(data.PCP_Details.Record[i].PCP_MAIN_PK);\\n tablenewDispute.tablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[i].PCRNoNew.value=data1.PCP_Details.Record[i].PCP_MAIN_PK;\\n if(data1.PCP_Details.Record[i].D_IPC_DESCR!==\\"null\\"){\\n tablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[i].DescNew.value=data1.PCP_Details.Record[i].D_IPC_DESCR;\\n }\\n if(data1.PCP_Details.Record[i].E_EST_COST!==\\"null\\"){\\n tablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[i].DollarNew.value=\\"$ \\"+dollarUSLocale12.format(data1.PCP_Details.Record[i].E_EST_COST);\\n }\\n if(data1.PCP_Details.Record[i].E_TIME_IMPACT!==\\"null\\"){\\n tablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[i].DelayDaysNew.value=data1.PCP_Details.Record[i].E_TIME_IMPACT;\\n }\\n if(data1.PCP_Details.Record[i].E_REC_DATE!==\\"null\\"){\\n tablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[i].DateSuppNew.value=data1.PCP_Details.Record[i].E_REC_DATE;\\n }\\n if(data1.PCP_Details.Record[i].E_COMMENT_DATE!==\\"null\\"){\\n \\ttablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[i].DateResNew.value=data1.PCP_Details.Record[i].E_COMMENT_DATE;\\n }\\n tablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[i].visible=true;\\n if(count2===1){\\n if(data2.Existing_Details.ExisRecord.PCP_MAIN_PK === data1.PCP_Details.Record[i].PCP_MAIN_PK && tablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[i].newDisputetableItem11.enabled === true){\\n tablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[i].newDisputetableItem11.enabled=false;\\n \\ttablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[i].newDisputetableItem11.value = \\"Y\\";\\n \\ttablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[i].DateReferNew.value=data2.Existing_Details.ExisRecord.CREATED_DATE;\\n }\\n }\\n else if(count2>1){\\n for(var k=0; k<data2.Existing_Details.ExisRecord.length; k++){\\n // && tablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[i].PCRNoNew.enabled === true\\n if(data2.Existing_Details.ExisRecord[k].PCP_MAIN_PK === data1.PCP_Details.Record[i].PCP_MAIN_PK && tablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[i].newDisputetableItem11.enabled === true){\\n tablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[i].newDisputetableItem11.enabled=false;\\n tablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[i].newDisputetableItem11.value = \\"Y\\";\\n tablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[i].DateReferNew.value=data2.Existing_Details.ExisRecord[k].CREATED_DATE;\\n //checkCount = checkCount + 1;\\n }\\n } \\n }\\n }\\n \\tif(count1 == count2){ \\n button_18784858221655692656075.visible = false;\\n MeetingType.visible = false;\\n \\t alert(\\"All PCRs are linked to existing disputes\\");\\n }\\n else{\\n button_18784858221655692656075.visible = true;\\n MeetingType.visible = true;\\n }\\n newDisputeMeetingrequest.visible = true;\\n\\t\\t\\tmainPanel.visible = false;\\n }\\n //newDisputeMeetingrequest.visible = true;\\n\\t//mainPanel.visible = false;\\n }\,\\n \\terror: function(err){\\n \\n\\t}\\n});"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true},{"script":{"content":"newDisputeMeetingrequest.visible = true;\\nmainPanel.visible = false;"\,"event":"Click"\,"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.mainPanel.dashboard.newDisputeMeeting"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]

fd:scripts.fd:init: [{"script":{"content":"/* Retreieve the URL parameters data */\\nvar params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);\\nvar actualData=JSON.parse(window.atob(params.get('input')));\\n//console.log(actualData);\\n/* Retreive the ea and district data from URL parameter */\\nea.value=actualData.ea;\\ndistrict.value=actualData.district;\\n/* store the required parameter details to get the dispute table data */\\nvar jsonData={'ea':ea.value\,'district':district.value\,'InfoType':'Complete'\,'DRType' : actualData.type};\\n//console.log(jsonData);\\n/* Invoke the backend process the get the dispute table information */\\n$.ajax({ \\n type: 'GET'\, \\n contentType: 'application/xml'\, \\n url: window.location.protocol+\\"//\\"+window.location.hostname+\\":\\"+window.location.port+'/rest/services/Caltrans-eADR/Processes/GetDisputeMeetings'\,\\n data: jsonData\,\\n success: function (data) {\\n //console.log(data.getElementsByTagName(\\"GetRowCount\\")[0].innerHTML);\\n count=parseInt(data.getElementsByTagName(\\"GetRowCount\\")[0].innerHTML);\\n /* If table is empty\, show the no data available row inside table */\\n if(count === 0){\\n DisTableNoDataRow.visible = true;\\n }\\n /* If table is not empty\, show the table data */\\n if(count>0){\\n jsonResponse = JSON.parse(data.getElementsByTagName(\\"DRBMembersDetailsJson\\")[0].innerHTML);\\n // console.log(jsonResponse.Dispute_Meetings);\\n //console.log(data.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting.length);\\n if(count===1){\\n //console.log(table1.Row1.instanceManager.instances);\\n DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.addInstance(1);\\n //tableItem11.value=data[i].Select;\\n DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[0].table1_item1.value=jsonResponse.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting.DISPUTE_MEETING_ID;\\n DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[0].table1_item2.value=jsonResponse.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting.TYPE_OF_MEETING;\\n DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[0].table1_item3.value=jsonResponse.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting.DISPUTE_CURRENT_STATUS;\\n if(jsonResponse.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting.DISPUTE_PENDING_STATUS !== \\"null\\"){\\n \\tDisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[0].table1_item4.value=jsonResponse.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting.DISPUTE_PENDING_STATUS;\\n }\\n else{\\n DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[0].table1_item4.value = \\"---\\";\\n }\\n if(jsonResponse.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting.ASSIGNED_TO !== \\"null\\"){\\n \\tDisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[0].table1_item5.value=jsonResponse.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting.ASSIGNED_TO;\\n }\\n else{\\n DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[0].table1_item5.value = \\"---\\";\\n }\\n if(jsonResponse.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting.DUE_DATE!==\\"null\\"){\\n if(jsonResponse.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting.DISPUTE_CURRENT_STATUS === \\"Dispute Meeting Cancelled\\"){\\n DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[0].table1_item6.value = \\"---\\";\\n }\\n else{\\n \\tDisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[0].table1_item6.value=jsonResponse.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting.DUE_DATE;\\n }\\n }\\n if(jsonResponse.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting.MEETING_DATE!==\\"null\\"){\\n DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[0].table1_item7.value=jsonResponse.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting.MEETING_DATE;\\n }\\n else{\\n DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[0].table1_item7.value = \\"---\\";\\n }\\n DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[0].visible=true;\\n }\\n else{\\n for(var i=0; i<count; i++){ \\n //console.log(table1.Row1.instanceManager.instances);\\n DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.addInstance(1);\\n //tableItem11.value=data[i].Select;\\n DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[i].table1_item1.value=jsonResponse.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting[i].DISPUTE_MEETING_ID;\\n DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[i].table1_item2.value=jsonResponse.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting[i].TYPE_OF_MEETING;\\n DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[i].table1_item3.value=jsonResponse.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting[i].DISPUTE_CURRENT_STATUS;\\n if(jsonResponse.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting[i].DISPUTE_PENDING_STATUS !== \\"null\\"){\\n DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[i].table1_item4.value=jsonResponse.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting[i].DISPUTE_PENDING_STATUS;\\n }\\n else{\\n DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[i].table1_item4.value = \\"---\\";\\n }\\n if(jsonResponse.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting[i].ASSIGNED_TO !== \\"null\\"){\\n DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[i].table1_item5.value=jsonResponse.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting[i].ASSIGNED_TO;\\n }\\n else{\\n DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[i].table1_item5.value = \\"---\\";\\n }\\n if(jsonResponse.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting[i].DUE_DATE!==\\"null\\"){\\n if(jsonResponse.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting[i].DISPUTE_CURRENT_STATUS === \\"Dispute Meeting Cancelled\\"){\\n DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[i].table1_item6.value = \\"---\\";\\n [{"script":{"content":"/* Get the role information */\\nvar params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);\\nvar actualData=JSON.parse(window.atob(params.get('input')));\\n//console.log(actualData);\\n/* If Role is either RE or Contractor then make \\"request a new dispute meeting\\" button visible\, else hide */\\nvar params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);\\nvar actualData=JSON.parse(window.atob(params.get('input')));\\n $.ajax({ \\n type: 'GET'\, \\n data: {'contractNo':actualData.contract_number\,'EA':actualData.ea\,\\"district\\":actualData.district\,'Type':actualData.type}\,\\n url: 'http://'+window.location.hostname+':8080/rest/services/Caltrans-eADR/Processes/GetSubmittedEstablishDetails'\, \\n success: function (data) {\\n\\t\\tcount=Number(data.getElementsByTagName(\\"RowCount\\")[0].innerHTML);\\n\\t\\tif(count>0){\\n\\t\\t\\tif(actualData.userRole.toString().toUpperCase()===\\"RE\\" || actualData.userRole.toString().toUpperCase()===\\"CONTRACTOR\\"){\\n\\t\\t\\t newDisputeMeeting.visible=true;\\n\\t\\t\\t}\\n\\t\\t\\telse{\\n\\t\\t\\t newDisputeMeeting.visible=false;\\n\\t\\t\\t}\\n\\t\\t}\\n\\t\\telse{\\n\\t\\t\\tnewDisputeMeeting.visible=false;\\n\\t\\t}\\n\\t}\,\\n\\terror: function(err){\\n \\t\\talert(\\"something went wrong\\");\\n\\t}\\n});\\n// for hiding horizontal tabs\\nguideBridge.resolveNode(\\"position-Contractor\\").visible = false;\\nguideBridge.resolveNode(\\"position-RE\\").visible = false;\\nrecReport.visible = false;\\nDMReportPanel.visible = false;"\,"event":"Initialize"\,"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.mainPanel.dashboard"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]
